title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 365.5 - Amendment of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 365.5 - Amendment of records

State Regulations

Within 30 business days of receipt of a written request from
a data subject for correction or amendment of a record or personal information, reasonably described, pertaining to that data subject, which he or she believes
is not accurate, relevant, timely or complete, the department shall: (a) make the correction in whole or in part
and inform the data subject that upon his or her request such correction or
amendment will be provided to any or all persons or governmental units to which
the record or personal information has been or is disclosed, pursuant to
paragraph (c) of subdivision 3 of section
94
of the

Public Officers Law; or
(b) inform
the data subject of its refusal to correct or amend the record and its reasons
therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
365.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
